messages.speech: "Solution": "The application should never publish available usernames. When an attacker gains thisinformation he increases his attack vector and reduces the timerequired to identify accounts.I.e:Imagine a forgot password function where the user enters his username in order for theapplication to send a new password to his email address, the user enters a correct usernameand the application responds with:“Email successfully sent to your email address.” When the user enters an incorrect username it says,  “Error: user does not exist.”This function would be vulnerable to username enumeration"
